Mercurius Cyberchair.name: メルクリウス サイバーチェア
Mercurius Cyberchair.description:
An impressively affordable cyberchair, offering great features at this price point. While using it the operator's base MOVE becomes 5, with all regular movement options remaining available.

Operation of the cyberchair requires either a free hand, or interface plugs.

If the operator suffers a critical injury that reduces their MOVE, the MOVE of the cyberchair is instead effected.

The cyberchair cannot be targeted specifically, nor can it be disabled via EMP effects.

Spider Cyberchair.name: スパイダー サイバーチェア
Spider Cyberchair.description:
The top of the line cyberchair, giving the premier user many options. While using it the operator's base MOVE becomes 5, with all regular movement options remaining available.

Additionally, this cyberchair has room for 4 cyberlimb options*. Any options installed always count as being paired.

Operation of the cyberchair requires either a free hand, or interface plugs.

If the operator suffers a critical injury that reduces their MOVE, the MOVE of the cyberchair is instead effected.

The cyberchair cannot be targeted specifically, nor can it be disabled via EMP effects.

*Installing cyberlimp options currently not supported
